## left-pad

String left pad.

P.S: [I've unpublished it from NPM.](https://medium.com/@azerbike/i-ve-just-liberated-my-modules-9045c06be67c#.b6xzn8r6w)

## Install

```bash
$ npm install azer/left-pad
```

## Usage

```js
leftpad = require('left-pad')

leftpad('foo', 5)
// => "  foo"

leftpad('foobar', 6)
// => "foobar"

leftpad(1, 2, 0)
// => "01"
```
